NK039(ti)003:0: dpal ldan lha mo'i spyan 'dren chung ba ni /
NK039(ti)003:2: ma yi nang nas ma cig ma //
NK039(ti)003:3: sring gi nang nas sring gcig ma //
NK039(ti)003:4: dpal ldan gnyen gyi rdo rje re ma ti //
NK039(ti)003:5: bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma //
NK039(ti)003:6: lha yi gnas nas lha mo nam gru ma //
NK039(ti)003:7: klu yi gnas nas klu mo glog 'gyu ma //
NK039(ti)003:8: srin gyi nang nas srin mo sham shams ma //
NK039(ti)003:9: mi yi gnas nas bdud mo re ti ma //
NK039(ti)003:10: dgra bgegs bdud la khyod pas che ba med //
NK039(ti)003:11: gnas ni byang shar mtshams na gnas //
NK039(ti)003:12: rgyug ni bar snang khams su rgyug /
NK039(ti)003:14: rkang la lcags kyis lham gyon ma //
NK039(ti)003:15: sku la mdzes pa'i re lde gsol //
NK039(ti)003:16: mi mgo rta mgo mkhar du brtsegs //
NK039(ti)003:17: thod pa dgu brtsegs gzhal yas nas //
NK039(ti)003:18: ma cig lha mo spyan 'dren no //
NK039(ti)003:19: do nub nam gyi gong thun la //
NK039(ti)003:20: ming po rdo rje'i las bcol na //
NK039(ti)003:21: sring mo dam can las mdzod cig /
NK039(ti)003:22: ma bos pa'i tshe na snyan ma sra //
NK039(ti)003:23: g.yab pa'i tshe na spyan ma rdul //
NK039(ti)003:24: brten pa'i tshe na rgyangs ma ring //
NK039(ti)003:25: bskul ba'i tshe na bang ma bul //
NK039(ti)003:26: rbad pa'i tshe na mthu ma chung /
NK039(ti)003:27: 'dir byon rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrungs //
NK039(ti)003:28: bcol pa'i phrin las grub par mdzod //
